Package com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

PayPal Mobile SDK for Android

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FuturePaymentConsentActivity
    Prompts the user for a Log In with PayPal consent.
    FuturePaymentInfoActivity
    Legal disclaimer link for when a user is approving future payments.
    LoginActivity
    Authenticates the user to PayPal.
    PaymentActivity
    Primary Activity for simple payments with the PayPal Android SDK.
    PaymentConfirmActivity
    Prompts the user to confirm the transaction.

    No money is moved until the user presses the confirm button.
    PaymentConfirmation
    Provides all information needed to confirm and verify the payment.
    PaymentMethodActivity  
    PayPalAuthorization
    Resulting information from PayPalFuturePaymentActivity.
    PayPalConfiguration
    Defines the configuration parameters for the SDK, via the PayPalService.EXTRA_PAYPAL_CONFIGURATION intent extra at service startup.
    PayPalFuturePaymentActivity
    Primary Activity for getting user consent for PayPal Future Payments with the PayPal Android SDK.
    PayPalItem
    Provides option itemization detail for a PayPalPayment.
    PayPalOAuthScopes
    Holds the scopes to which the user is being asked to consent.
    PayPalPayment
    Describes the transaction.

    This object describes the payment request, and should be submitted to the PaymentActivity via the PaymentActivity.EXTRA_PAYMENT intent extra.
    PayPalPaymentDetails
    Optionally describes additional amount details for a PayPalPayment.

    This object specifies the the breakdown of a payment amount, including item subtotal, shipping, and tax.
    PayPalProfileSharingActivity
    Primary Activity for getting user consent for PayPal Profile Sharing with the PayPal Android SDK.
    PayPalService
    Service responsible for communicating with PayPal's servers.

    This service should be started shortly before your code interacts with the service, and stopped when the user is finished.
    ProfileSharingConsentActivity
    Prompts the user for a Log In with PayPal consent.
    ProofOfPayment
    Proof of payments made via the SDK.

    All payments must be verified.
    ShippingAddress
    Shipping Address - include an instance of ShippingAddress in a PayPalPayment to provide a shipping address from your app to the SDK
    Version
    Added for backward compatibility in PhoneGap

Package com.paypal.android.sdk.payments Description

PayPal Mobile SDK for Android
